name: Primitive FPS
description:
This game was made it as the first game exercise for the "Master in Video Game Development with Unity3D and Virtual Reality" on CICE School in Madrid (https://www.cice.es/master-en-desarrollo-de-videojuegos-realidad-virtual-unity/).

To make this the teacher create some rules that was need it to apply.

  • Menu.
  • Intro.
  • Movement with WASD or Arrows keys
  • Jump with Space bar.
  • Shoot with mouse.
  • Get new Weapons.
  • Create 2 kind of enemies 1 stupid and other that will to try to kill you exploting or shooting you, only if you are in a close to him.
  • Lava damage or poison damage.
  • Final Boss.

There are some bugs that i know xD, the mechanics are strange, well in fact all the game is strange xD.
